overview: Paul Canon is fresh out of school and is looking to finally make some crazy memories. He's young, hung and ready to fuck. He walks right into a frat house full of naked men about to get it on. After a little convincing, they let him stay and go to town on each others ass. Paul is late for his graduation and doesn't have anything to wear. John agrees to hook him up if he can get a quickie hook up first.
title: Late Bloomer
